title: FontLab & Guidlines -Global/Local
content:
We need to use the global guidelines...BUT where is the command? The same thing about Guidelines Popup Menu - Where???   
   
We read the user guide pp.310 - 315. BUT can't understand.....   
   
Any guide?   
   
Thank you
author: thelring

comments.content: Right click on a guide; in the context menu select "Convert to global".
Ok Ok. I see that. Thank you!
also if you hold down shift while you drag your guide from the top/left it becomes a global guideline.
THANK YOU ALL!!! I as wondering that myself.
